tool_description: Get random anime pfp and gif's using the anyanime api
name: Any Anime
title: Any Anime

api_list.name: anime
api_list.description:
# AnyAnime [ anime ]
Anyanime API is a free API that allows you to get a random anime images for your projects.

required_parameters.name: type
required_parameters.description:
# Endpoint - /v1/anime/:type/:number

- v1 - Version of the api
- anime - Type [ default]
- :type - Type of image [ png | gif ]
- :number - Number of images [ 1 - 10 ] [ default 1 ]

optional_parameters.name: number
optional_parameters.description:
# Number param
Default to 1 if number is not provided
Max limit is 10

## Params and query

- v1 - Version of the api
- anime - Type [ default]
- :type - Type of image [ png | gif ]
- :number - Number of images [ 1 - 10 ] [ default 1 ]

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://any-anime.p.rapidapi.com/v1/anime/gif/1"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "any-anime.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://any-anime.p.rapidapi.com/v1/anime/{type}/{number}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "any-anime.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
